body.raw:
{ "action" : "j1-course", "entity_action" : "I", "data" : { "catalog_appid" : "9999999", "org_cde" : "*LOCAL", "crs_cde" : "TS23", "formatted_crs_cde" : "test-course-23", "crs_title" : "Test Course 23", "catalog_text" : "\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n

This course is typically offered in Fall, Spring, Summer I and Summer II.

\n

This course provides a firm foundation for the study of statistics in other fields. Although no one field is emphasized to the exclusion of others, applications are drawn from psychology, political science, exercise science, and other areas. NOTE: This course can be used to satisfy the university Core Quantitative Reasoning B (QB) requirement. Although it may be usable towards graduation as a major requirement or university elective, it cannot be used to satisfy any of the university GenEd requirements. See your advisor for further information.

\n\n", "sections" : [ { "section_appid" : "564648", "yr_cde" : "2021", "trm_cde" : "10", "crs_cde" : "TS23", "formatted_crs_cde" : "test-course-23", "first_begin_dte" : "2022-08-30", "last_end_dte" : "2022-12-31", "final_enrollment_dte" : "2022-12-31", "course_fees" : "0.00", "open_seats" : "94", "execution_site" : "NORTH", "credit_hrs" : "3.00", "crs_clock_hrs" : "0.00", "instructors" : [ { "section_instructor_appid" : "132165465", "yr_cde" : "2021", "trm_cde" : "10", "crs_cde" : "TS23", "section_appid" : "564648", "instructor_id_num" : "1379", "last_name" : "Baker", "first_name" : "Isaac", "middle_name" : "A" } ], "schedules" : [ { "section_schedule_appid" : "2982", "yr_cde" : "2021", "trm_cde" : "10", "crs_cde" : "TS23", "section_appid" : "564648", "begin_dte" : "2022-08-30", "begin_tim" : "11:00:00", "end_dte" : "2022-12-31", "end_tim" : "11:50:00", "monday_cde" : "M", "wednesday_cde" : "W", "friday_cde" : "F", "loc_cde" : "MAIN", "location_description" : "Main Campus", "bldg_cde" : "ROOP", "building_description" : "Roop Hall", "room_cde" : "102", "room_description" : "102 Classroom" } ] } ] } }
